name: Mantle of Intelligence
description: A beautiful sapphire mantle worn by generations of queens.
additionalInfo: The item's attributes grant the following additional stats:
36 mana, 0.15 mana regeneration and 0.3% flat base magic resistance.
3 main attack damage to intelligence heroes.
1.35 main attack damage to universal heroes.
trivia: This item is based on the Mantle of Intelligence from Warcraft 3.
